      • checkRange

        public static int checkRange(int val,
                             int min,
                             int max)
        Checks if the given value is in range. If not -1 is returned.
        Parameters:
        val - the value to check
        min - the min value (in bound)
        max - the max value ( in bound)
        Returns:
        the value or -1

      • checkRange

        public static int checkRange(int val,
                             int min,
                             int max,
                             int other)
        Checks if the given value is in bounds.
        Parameters:
        val - the value to check
        min - the min (in bound)
        max - the max (in bound)
        other - should the given value not be in bounds, "other" is returned instead.
        Returns:
        the value or "other"
